title: unable to log out of a perma banned account.
body: So i log into the new client today, and i logged into my perma banned account by accident. The problem is i have selected the stay logged in option. Now i can not sign out. Please help !!!

replies.body: change your password on browser then next time you open league cilent you can log into another acc

I would assume there would have to be a sign out option somewhere in the settings panel or maybe when you hit the X. Failing that though, submit a ticket to player support and they may be able to either point you in the right direction or clear that option from their end.
